name: Silly Maze Color
description:
A reaper is behind you! Find your way out by filling silly maze with your color.

Swipe all around to paint your color all over the maze to unlock gates and reach the portal to level up! Isn't it a-maze-ingly satisfying to paint clean white maze with your color?

Use your rapid puzzle solving skills to progress. With more than 100 levels in Silly Maze Color, you will have something to brag about to your friends to get them a-maze-d!
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
